high_descs: Turn left then walk towards the desk, turn left then head towards the trash can.
Pick the CD up out of the trash can.
Turn right then heads the desk against the wall.
Turn the lamp on that is located next to the wall.
anns.task_desc: Take the CD out of the trash and turn the lamp on.

high_descs: turn to the left and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the green waste basket
take out the CD from the green waste basket
turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the wall and turn to the right and go to the desk
turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a CD by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: Turn left, go to the trash can, face the trash can on the left.
Pick up the CD in the trash can.
Turn right, move to the lamp on the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the CD in the light of the lamp on the desk.
